title: Build an image classifier (ML Zero to Hero - Part 4)
excerpt: In part four of Machine Learning Zero to Hero, AI Advocate Laurence Moroney (lmoroney@) discusses the build of an image classifier for rock, paper, and scissors. In episode one, we showed a scenario of rock, paper, and scissors; and discussed how difficult it might be to write code to detect and classify
